comment: She was a really great professor. She clearly cares about all of her students. I very much recommend taking her.
She is very sweet lady! She is very flexible with you and always gives excellent feedback. 100% would recommend taking her class!

We had quizzes for each 3-4 chapters of the online textbook. She is a really sweet lady and made this class more enjoyable than expected and brought us food sometimes. The only thing that bothered me about her is that sometimes she was moody and our final is a 2-4 page paper, while other seminar classes are taking a 20 question test.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS
